text: Jihohin Najeriya bakwai da ke kan gaba a samun kudin shiga.
label: hausa

text: Da kuɗaɗen ne jihohin ke gudanar da ayyuka da biyan albashi da kuma tafiyar da gwamnati.
label: hausa

text: Don haka idan babu wannan kuɗi jihohin ƙasar da dama ba za su iya gudanar da kansu ba.
label: hausa

text: To sai dai akwai jihohin da ke ƙoƙorin samar wa kansu hanyoyin dogaro da kai ta hanyar inganta karɓar haraji da inganta kasuwanci domin dogaro da kansu.
label: hausa

text: Sai dai cibiyar ta BudgetIT ba ta sanya jihar Rivers - mai ɗimbin arzikin man fetur - cikin lissafin ba, saboda dokar-ta-ɓacin da aka sanya wa jihar a farkon shekarar nan, lamarin da ya sa ta kasa wallafa abin da samu a 2024.
label: hausa

text: Legas ta yi gagarumin yunƙuri wajen haɓa wa kanta kuɗin shiga.
label: hausa

text: Kuma bayanai sun ce kashi 73 cikin 100 na wannan kudi jihar - wadda ke kudu maso yammacin ƙasar ta same su ne daga harajin da take karɓa.
label: hausa

text: Jihar Enugu da ke yankin kudu maso gabashin Najeriya na daga cikin jihohin da ke kan gaba wajen samun kuɗin shiga, a cewar BudgetIT.
label: hausa

text: Ana ganin jihar za ta iya riƙe kanta da abin da take samu ko da ba ta samun kason tarayya ba.
label: hausa

text: Jihar ta samu gagarumin ci gaba na kuɗin shigar da take samu a cikin gida.
label: hausa

text: Arzikin da jihar ta samu a cikin gida a 2024 ya kai naira biliyan 180.50, ciki har da naira biliya 26.68 da ta samu ta hanyar biyan haraji.
label: hausa

text: Hukumar tattara haraji ta jihar ta Kano, KIRS ta kuma sha alwashin tattara harajin cikin gida da ya kai naira biliyan 180 a 2026.
label: hausa

text: Jihar Kwara - wadda ke tsakiyar Najeriya na daga cikin jihohin ƙasar da ake ganin karansu ya kai tseko ta fuskar tara kuɗin shiga a cikin gida.
label: hausa

text: A cewar BudgetIT, jihar ta samu naira biliyan 107.83 a 2024, daga cikin waɗannan naira biliyan 34.83 ta samu ne daga haraji.
label: hausa

text: Babbar matsalar ita ce barazanar da China ke yi wa tsaron Birtaniya ta zarce irin leƙen asirin da aka saba da shi.

text: Nna m gbahapụrụ anyị oge m na-etolite etolite - Charles Born.
label: igbo

text: Charles Born na-eme ejije ekwuola na nna ya gbahapụrụ ya na ụmụnne ya nakwa nne ha oge ha na-etolite etolite.
label: igbo

text: Nwaamadị ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri a maara dịka All Pronouns Duly Observed kwupụtara nke a na mkparịtaụka pụrụiche ya na BBC Igbo nwere.
label: igbo

text: O kwuru na ọ bụ oge ya nwetara ohere agụmaakwụkwọ na mahadum ka nna ya kwuru na ọ naghị alụzi nne ya, ma gbahapụ ha.
label: igbo

text: Nne m sitere mgbe ahu malite ilekọta anyị, maka na ọ lụọla dị, mụọ ụmụ, ọ gaghị agbahapụ anyị.
label: igbo

text: 'Ọ bụ nne m zụrụ anyị niile n'ụlọakwụkwọ, ọkachasị mụ onwe m, maka na oge nna m kwuru na ya anaghị alụzi nne m bụ oge m chọrọ ịbanye mahadum,' ka Charles kọọrọ anyị.
label: igbo

text: Charles Born kwuru na ya malitere ime ejije nkwago oge ọ nọ na mahadum, mana o mechara banye Nollywood oge ndị enyi ya gụnyere Eso Dike gwara ya na ego dị n'ejije.
label: igbo

text: O kwuru ya na ya rụburu ọrụ dịka onye mgbasaozi n'ụlọmgbasaozi Rave TV na Hot FM dịcha na Legọs steeti, tupu ọ malite ime ejije.
label: igbo

text: Charles Born sịrị na ọ ga-amasị ya ịbụ onye na-eme ejije a ma ama n'ụwa dum n'ọdịnihu.
label: igbo

text: 'Achọrọ m inwe ụlọọrụ mmepụta ejije nke m. Achọrọ m ide, mepụta ma tuzie aka n'ejije nke m. Achọrọ m inye ndị ọhụrụ ohere ka ha chakee,' ka o kwuru.
label: igbo

text: O nyere ndị nwere mmasị ime ejije ndụmọdụ ka ha gbaa mbọ na-ewepụta ụdịrị ihe ngosi dị iche iche, ma n'ụdị foto ma n'ụdị onyonyoo oge niile.
label: igbo

text: Ọzụzụ dịkwa oké mkpa, n'ihi na ị gaghị achọ ọnọdụ ọ ga-abụ onye na-emepụta ejije maọbụ onye na-atuzi aka ga-asị na ị naghị agbanwe agbanwe, n'agbanyeghị agwa ọbụla e nyere gị n'ejije.
label: igbo

text: Ọzọ abụrụ ka ị na-ekpe ekpere, n'ihi na o nweghị ihe Chineke na-apụghị ime.
label: igbo

text: O nweghị ihe nyịrị Chineke n'omume.
label: igbo

text: Naanị gaa n'ihu na-ekpe ekpere, ka Charles gwara ndị na-achọ ime ejije.
label: igbo

text: Charles Ugochukwu Born bụ onye Agbaje dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Nwangele n'Imo steeti.
label: igbo

text: Ọ gụrụ ihe ọmụmụ Information Science and Technology na mahadum Madonna University dị n'Ọkịja n'Anambra steeti.
label: igbo

text: Charles Born alụbeghị nwunye, ma o nwebeghị onye o kwere nkwa ọlụlụ.
label: igbo

text: Wọn ko ti i lo to iṣẹju mẹwaa lori papa, ti Samuel Chukwueze fi kọkọ gba bọọlu kan sinu awọn Sudan.
label: yoruba

text: Ka to o tun ṣẹju pẹ́, bọọlu miran lati ọdọ Awoniyi tun ti yí sinu ile Sudan, eyi to mu ki ifẹsẹwọnsẹ naa jẹ ami ayo meji si odo ni abala akọkọ.
label: yoruba

text: 'A fi bi ẹni pe orilẹ-ede Sudan sin wọn wa sori papa ni ọrọ ri nigba ti abala keji idije naa tun bẹrẹ.
label: yoruba

text: Laarin iṣẹju kan ti wọn wọ ori papa ni ọmọ orilẹ-ede Naijiria, Moses Simon tun ju goolu kan sinu awọn Sudan.
label: yoruba

text: Eyi to mu ki o di ami ayo mẹta si odo.
label: yoruba

text: Awọn agbabọọlu Naijiria ti kọkọ lu ikọ Pharaohs ti orilẹede Egypt lọjọ Iṣẹgun to kọja.
label: yoruba

text: Orilẹede Sudan jẹ ọkan lara awọn ikọ agbabọọlu to ti pẹ julọ ni ilẹ Afirika.
label: yoruba

text: Sudan jẹ ọkan lara awọn orilẹede mẹta to kopa ni idije ife ẹyẹ bọọlu afẹsẹgba ilẹ adulawọ akọkọ, pẹlu Egypt ati Ethipia lọdun 1957.
label: yoruba

text: Ọdun 1970 ni Sudan gba ife ẹyẹ naa nigba to gbalejo idije ọhun.
label: yoruba

text: Orilẹede Naijiria lo n le tente loke ipin D pẹlu ami mẹta lẹyin ti Sudan ati Guinea Bissau ta ọmi olodo ti wọn si ni ami kọọkan.
label: yoruba

text: Bi Sudan ba lee bori ifẹsẹwọnsẹ naa, yoo mu wọn duro digbi lati kogoja fun ipele to kan.
label: yoruba

text: Amọṣa bi o ba jẹ Super Eagles Naijiria lo ba bori, ipele ẹlẹni mẹrindinlogun to kan di dandan fun wọn niyẹn.
label: yoruba

text: Awọn odu ẹlẹsẹ ayo ti aye yoo maa fẹ ri lasiko ifẹsẹwọnsẹnaa.
label: yoruba

text: Oju rẹ lọpọ yoo tun maa wo lasiko ifẹsẹwọnsẹ wọn.
label: yoruba

text: Yasin Hamed naa wa lara awọn agbabọọlu Sudan to n gba bọọlu jẹun nilẹ Yuroopu. Atamatase ti wọn yoo si maa wo oju rẹ niyi.
label: yoruba

text: Ohun ti awọn akọnimọọgba ikọ mejeeji n sọ.
label: yoruba

text: Akọnimọọgba orilẹede Naijiria, Augustine Eguavoen ni oun ko ro pe ifẹsẹwọnsẹ naa yoo rọrun bi awọn eeyan kan ṣe n ro.
label: yoruba

text: Gbogbo wa la mọ pataki bibori ifẹsẹwọnsẹ to kan yii. A mọ pe ko ni rọgbọ rara, mo si lero pe bi a ba tete yi ero yii pada ni yoo dara fun gbogbo wa.
label: yoruba

text: Gẹgẹ bi ana, orilẹede Cameroun yege, wọn bori lati wọ ipele oloju mẹrindinlogun.
label: yoruba

text: Awa naa yoo gbiyanju lati ṣe bẹẹ pẹlu. Ko lee rọrun gẹgẹ bi mo ṣe sọ, ṣugbọn afojusun wa niyi.
label: yoruba

text: Lootọ ni pe a ṣe awọn aṣiṣe kan ninu ifẹsẹwọnsẹ wa pẹlu Guinea-Bissau, ṣugbọn a lee ṣe ohun gbogbo to ba tọ.
label: yoruba

text: A mọ pe ikọ to gbayi ni Naijiria, wọn ma maa lepa lati bori ni. Ikọ nla ni ṣugbọn olukuluku lo ni agbara rẹ.
label: yoruba

text: Ohun ti eyi tumọ si ni pe orilẹede Naijiria yoo san alekun owo 99.72 fun lita bẹntiroolu ati disu ti wọn ba n ko wọle.
label: yoruba

text: Bi iroyin naa sẹ jade ni ọpọ araalu ti n fi aidunnu wọn han lori rẹ, wọn ni ohun ti yoo tun mu ọwọngogo ọja ati inira tuntun waye leyi.
label: yoruba

text: Ṣugbọn awọn oṣiṣẹ elepo labẹle ni Naijiria faramọ igbesẹ aarẹ yii, wọn ni yoo jẹ ọna kan lati gbogun ti kiko epo bẹntiroolu olowo pọọku wọle.
label: yoruba

text: Wọn fi kun un pe yoo ran fifọ epo nilẹẹ wa lọwọ, yoo si tun da aabo bo ẹka ipesẹ agbara.
label: yoruba

text: Ṣugbọn ki ni alaye ajọ Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) to n pawo wọle labẹnu?
label: yoruba

text: Nigba to n ṣalaye afikun owo ori epo yii ninu atẹjade kan, Alaga FIRS, Zacch Adedeji, sọ pe ki gbogbo ẹ le wa ni ibamu pẹlu ohun to n ṣẹlẹ lorilẹede Naijiria ni.
label: yoruba

text: Alaga ajọ to n pawo wọle labẹnu naa sọ pe afikun yii ki i ṣe lati fi kun owo tijọba n pa wọle, ṣugbọn lati jẹ ki owo ilẹ okeere ṣe rẹgi pẹlu ohun to wa nilẹ ni Naijiria ni.
label: yoruba

text: Bakan naa lo ni o tun wa fun lati ro ẹka ifọpo Naijiria lagbara, ko si ṣẹgun aigbọra ẹni ye to maa n waye laaarin awọn to n fọ epo labẹle ati awọn alagbata epo.
label: yoruba

text: Bi fifọ epo labẹle ṣe ti n goke si i, ti disu naa si ti n pọ daadaa, owo ti a n ta wọn ko duro loju kan, lara ohun to si n fa a ni aigbọra ẹniye laarin awọn to n fọ epo ilẹ wa ati awon alagbata.
label: yoruba

text: Cote d'Ivoire n ta tiẹ ni $1.52 ,Ghana si n ta a ni $1.37 fun lita kan.
label: yoruba

text: Ìgbà wo ní àfikún owo orí epo náa yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀?
label: yoruba

text: Alaga ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń rí sí àtúnṣe owó orí, Taiwo Oyedele, ṣalaye pe afikun yii ki i ṣe ohun ti yoo bẹrẹ lẹsẹkẹsẹ.
label: yoruba

text: O ni o digba ti idagbasoke to foju han ba ba awọn ẹka ọrọ aje, ti owo naira si gbera sọ si i .
label: yoruba

text: Oyedele fi kun un pe o si le jẹ nigba ti owo epo rọbi ba ja walẹ lọja agbaye.
label: yoruba

text: O ni bo tilẹ jẹ pe igbesẹ naa wa fun lati fi owo to ba yọ nibẹ tun ọna ṣe, yoo mu inira ba araalu bi won ba bẹrẹ rẹ lasiko yii.
label: yoruba

text: Gẹgẹ bi Alaga atunṣe owo ori naa ṣe tẹsiwaju, o ni aarẹ tẹlẹ, Olusegun Obasanjo, nigba tiẹ, ṣeto pe wọn yoo maa fi owo to ba n wole lati ara epo tun ọna ṣe.
label: yoruba

text: Ida ogoji(40% ) fun atunṣe ọna ijọba apapọ, ati ida ọgọta (60%) fun ọna ipinlẹ.
label: yoruba

text: Aba naa mu ọgbọn wa pupọ, wọn si ti n lo o ni awọn orilẹede bii aadọjọ (150).
label: yoruba

text: O ni awọn ro o nigba naa pe yoo mu inira wa fun araalu.
label: yoruba

text: Ni temi o, asiko to maa daa ju ni nigba ti owo naira ba lagbara si i, tabi ti owo epo ba ja walẹ. Nigba naa ni afikun yii ko ni i kan iye ti wọn n ta epo.
label: yoruba

text: Ṣaa, ireti araalu ni pe ki igbesẹ tuntun yii ma ṣe mu alekun inira wa.
label: yoruba

text: Wo akọni obìnrin ọmọ Nàíjíríà tó balẹ̀ sí London pẹ̀lú ọmọ̀ kékeré mẹ́ta, báàgi kan àti owó díẹ̀ àmọ́ tó padà di ògbóǹtarigì onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì.
label: yoruba

text: Lọ́jọ́ kan lọ́dún 1990, Ijeoma Uchegbu pẹ̀lú àwọn ọmọbìnrin rẹ̀ mẹ́ta èyí tí ọmọ ọwọ́ wà nínú wọn, balẹ̀ sí ìlú London pẹ̀lú báàgì kan ṣoṣo àti owó díẹ̀ tí kò lè tó wọn ná láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìgbé ayé tuntun.
label: yoruba

text: Ijeoma padà sílùú London níbi tí wọ́n ti bi ní ọgbọ̀n ọdún sẹ́yìn.
label: yoruba

text: Láàárín ọ̀sẹ̀ díẹ̀, ó bá ara rẹ̀ ní ilé ìjọba níbi tí ọ̀pọ̀ èrò ń gbé, tó sì ń tiraka láti jẹun àti ẹ ìtọ́jú àwọn ẹbí rẹ̀.
label: yoruba

text: Báwo ló ṣe wá di ẹni tó ń léwájú nínú ìmọ̀ 'nanoparticles'?
label: yoruba

text: Ìrìnàjò Ijeoma bẹ̀rẹ̀ nígbà tí àwọn òbí rẹ̀ gbé oyún rẹ̀ láti Nàìjíríà lọ sí UK lọ́dún 1960, tí wọ́n sì fun ní orúkọ tó rẹwà lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n bi tán.
label: yoruba

text: Wọ́n fún mi lórúkọ Ijeoma èyí tó túmọ̀ sí ìrìnàjò rere pẹ̀lú èròńgbà pé nǹkan máa lọ déédéé fún àwọn ní orílẹ̀ èdè tuntun tí wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kó dé.
label: yoruba

text: Ọdún mẹ́rin ni Ijeoma lò lọ́dọ̀ àwọn tó ń tọ́jú rẹ̀ náà kí bàbá rẹ̀ tó wá gbe lọ́jọ́ kan.
label: yoruba

text: Mi ò mọ nǹkan tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀, mo kàn rántí pé Aunt Pat, orúkọ ti mo máa ń pe ìyá tó gbà mí tọ́ nìyẹn kò sí pẹ̀lú mi mọ, tó sì jẹ́ pé bàbá mi ni mow à pẹ̀lú.
label: yoruba

text: Bákan náà ni àwọn òbí Ijeoma kò sí papọ̀ mọ́, tó sì jẹ́ pé ìyàwó míì tí bàbá Ijeoma fẹ́ ló ń tọ́jú rẹ̀ láti ìgbà tí wọ́n ti lọ gbe kúrò lọ́dọ̀ alágbàtọ́ rẹ̀.
label: yoruba

text: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́wàá ni Ijeoma wà kó tó mọ̀ wí pé ìyá náà gan kọ́ ló bí òun.
label: yoruba

text: Ìgbà yẹn ni mo tó mọ̀ pé ìyá míì wà tó da ẹ̀jẹ̀ lémi lórí gangan.
label: yoruba

text: Nígbà tí Ijeoma pé ẹni ọdún mẹ́tàlá ló tó fi ojú kan ìyá rẹ̀ gangan.
label: yoruba

text: Ó rántí pé níṣe ni inú ìyá òun dùn gan-an nígbà tí àwọn pàdé.
label: yoruba

text: Nigerian Nobel laureate Wole Soyinka has said the US revoked his visa and banned him from the country.
label: english

text: The 91-year-old author, who won the Nobel Prize for literature in 1986.
label: english

text: the US consulate asked him to bring in his passport so his visa could be cancelled in person as new unspecified information had come to light.
label: english

text: The US embassy in Nigeria has said it cannot comment on individual cases.
label: english

text: The Nobel laureate has previously held permanent residency in the US but renounced it in 2016.
label: english

text: tearing up his green card in protest of President Donald Trump's election.
label: english

text: The green card is a permanent residence permit for the US - prized by many African immigrants to the US.
label: english

text: Soyinka affirmed on Tuesday that he no longer had his green card – and jokingly added that it had 'fallen between the fingers of a pair of scissors and it got cut into a couple of pieces'.
label: english

text: The famed author has had regular teaching engagements at US universities for the past 30 years.
label: english

text: Soyinka has long been critical of the Trump administration's radical stance on immigration and linked the visa revocation to his outspoken criticism.
label: english

text: He said his recent comparison of Trump to Uganda's dictator - 'Idi Amin in white face' - may have contributed to the current situation.
label: english

text: 'When I called Donald Trump Idi Amin, I thought I was paying him a compliment,' Soyinka said, 'he's been behaving like a dictator.'
label: english

text: Idi Amin was a Ugandan military officer and dictator who ruled the country from 1971 to 1979, infamous for his brutal regime and widespread human rights abuses.
label: english

text: When asked if he would consider going back to the US, Soyinka said: 'How old am I?'
label: english

text: In July, the US State Department announced sweeping changes to its non-immigrant visa policy for citizens of Nigeria and several other African countries.
label: english

text: According to the policy, nearly all non-immigrant and non-diplomatic visas issued to Nigerians and nationals of Cameroon, Ethiopia and Ghana.
label: english

text: would now be single-entry and valid for only three months, rolling back the up to five-year, multiple-entry visas they had enjoyed previously.
label: english

text: 'We fear for our souls' - Nigerian farmers need armed guards to protect them from jihadists.
label: english

text: As women water vegetables and uproot weeds in a rural corner of north-eastern Nigeria, men in uniform stand guard nearby holding huge rifles.
label: english

text: They are Agro Rangers - a special security unit set up by the government to defend farmers from militants from jihadist groups Boko Haram and Islamic State West Africa Province (Iswap).
label: english

text: 'There is fear - we fear for our souls,' Aisha Isa, 50, tells the BBC as she tends to her crops.
label: english

text: Because it is no longer safe for her family to live in the home they fled 11 years ago.
label: english

text: she and many others like her are bussed into Dalwa village from a pick-up point in the state capital, Maiduguri, early in the morning.
label: english

text: She now lives in temporary housing, and growing beans and maize remains the only way for her to feed her family, she says.
label: english

text: We will take the risk and come even if the rangers are not coming.
label: english

text: Here, the military has marked out a stretch of land, surrounded by clearly defined trenches, where people can plant their crops.
label: english

text: If they venture beyond that border, the threat of Boko Haram looms large.
label: english

text: 'We have been hearing people are being kidnapped,' says 42-year-old Mustapha Musa.
label: english

text: Some are killed. That is why I'm scared and don't want to come without security protection.
label: english

text: The father of 10 says he left his village, Konduga, 13 years ago and will not resettle there until the government brings about lasting security.
label: english

text: In the 15 years since the Islamist insurgency began in north-eastern Nigeria, thousands of people have died and millions have been forced from their homes.
label: english

text: The number of people killed in targeted attacks on farmers this year has more than doubled since 2024, according to research by the Armed Conflict Location and Event Data (Acled) monitoring group.
label: english

text: Yet the governor of Borno state is speeding up the reintegration of displaced people from camps back onto the land.
label: english

text: as part of his stabilisation agenda, and to counter disruptions in food production.
label: english

text: Almost four million people face food insecurity across conflict zones in Nigeria's north-east, the UN warns.
label: english

text: International Crisis Group, a non-profit organisation focused on resolving deadly conflict, says the policy is putting internally displaced people in danger.
label: english

text: highlighting that militant groups extort farmers in areas that it controls to raise funds for its violent extremism.
label: english

text: Kidnapped along with nine other farmers and still terrified long after the ordeal, Abba Mustapha Muhammed has seen first-hand what happens when victims do not pay up.
label: english

text: There was one that got killed because he couldn't pay the ransom. His family could not meet the time given.
label: english

text: He was killed and thrown away. They asked the family to come and take the dead body.
label: english

text: Being held captive in dense forest for three days was 'unbearable', he says.
label: english

text: The small meals they prepared often left us feeling hungry and gave us diarrhoea. There was no clean drinking water
label: english

text: The father-of-three tells the BBC he is too afraid to return to subsistence farming.
label: english

text: because 'the insurgents are still lurking. Just yesterday, they abducted over 10 people'.
label: english

text: Despite stories like these, Mohammed Hassan Agalama, the commander who leads the Agro Rangers scheme in Borno, insists that the guards deter militants from staging violent assaults.
label: english

text: We have not encountered more terrorists coming to attack the farmers because they know that we are fully on ground at the time of farming season.
label: english

text: says Cdt Agalama, who operates under the Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC).
label: english

text: James Bulus, a spokesperson for the NSCDC, argues that the government is making gains in its fight against the insurgents, telling the BBC.
label: english

text: The harvest alone is there to tell you that normalcy has returned, and farmers are doing their normal businesses in the farm.
label: english

text: Agro Rangers is a small-scale project and not a long-term solution for widespread regional insecurity.
label: english

text: We cannot be everywhere. We are not spirits. Can 600 armed Agro Rangers cover the whole of farms in Maiduguri? No.
label: english

text: For this reason, Nigeria's federal government says it plans to expand the Agro Rangers scheme.
label: english

text: Acled's senior Africa analyst Ladd Serwat says this year has seen a surge in the number of reported civilian fatalities due to targeted attacks on farmers by armed groups.
label: english

text: Furthermore, during the first half of 2025 reported killings by Boko Haram and Iswap reached their highest level in five years.
label: english

text: Over in Maiduguri's city centre, a group of farmers gather in the home of Adam Goni, the chair of the Borno branch of the National Association of Sorghum Producers, Processors and Marketers.
label: english

text: The men sit on rugs beneath the wide boughs of a tree, while two women sit on mats in the shade of a nearby veranda, as goats and chickens roam the compound.
label: english

text: The entire group has had their lives irrevocably changed by violence.
label: english

text: Among them is Baba Modu, whose 30-year-old nephew was gunned down on his farm by Boko Haram.
label: english

text: They killed humans like an ant, without remorse. The killings we've experienced have been devastating, but this year is the worst.
label: english

text: When I go out to farm, there's a constant threat of being killed. I don't have peace of mind even at home - I often sleep with my eyes open, feeling like we might be attacked.
label: english

text: Court don stop di plan by Nigeria main opposition Peoples Democratic Party to hold dia National convention.
label: pidgin

text: Court say di planned 2025 National Convention of the PDP no go hold until di party comply wit di statutory requirements of di PDP, di Constitution and di Electoral Act.
label: pidgin

text: Na Abraham Ammah, Austine Nwachukwu and George Turner wey carry di mata go court say PDP breach di party constitution for dia plan to hold di convention.
label: pidgin

text: Wia Cameroon opposition leader Issa Tchiroma Bakary dey?
label: pidgin

text: I thank di loyalist army, dem shown patriotism by escorting me to safe location and currently dem dey ensure my protection.
label: pidgin

text: Tchiroma Bakary bin claim say na im win di 12 October, presidential election for Cameroon but di constitutional council declare Paul Biya di winner of di election on Monday 27 October.
label: pidgin

text: Di 76-year-old opposition leader tok say im don move to safe location by im 'loyalists' in di military, afta one big protest break out in di kontri ova di weekend.
label: pidgin

text: Despite dis climate of terror to make us retreat, we no go give in. I diafore call on you, from Monday, November 3 to Wednesday, November 5, to observe ghost town.
label: pidgin

text: Make di entire kontri come to standstill, so di whole world go know say we dey resist and say we no go gree.
label: pidgin

text: Cameroonian pipo. Dis no be di time to dey for fear or dey divided.
label: pidgin

text: I repeat, dem no go steal our victory.
label: pidgin

text: I don make solemn pledge neva to betray una, and I no go fail.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na di reason for di rest of my life. We go win dis togada.
label: pidgin

text: Tchiroma Bakary call for 'ghost town' afta days of post-electoral violence wey don lead to di arrest of plenty pipo, some don die and some wunjure.
label: pidgin

text: Di UN, EU, France, Canada and rights groups such as Human Rights Watch and Amnesty International don condem di killings.
label: pidgin

text: Although normalcy don dey return to some parts of di kontri afta di protest, but di situation on ground remain unpredictable.
label: pidgin

text: Dem don steal our parents, our children prime, and peaceful marches don turn into blind repression, wit facie crimes.
label: pidgin

text: Hundreds don die and wunjure. Entire family dey in grief, recalling di traumatic events of 1984.
label: pidgin

text: While di pipo dey mourn dia misfortune, pipo wey dey responsible for dis tragedy dey celebrate shamelessly, displaying on social media dia cynicism and contempt for di pipo.
label: pidgin

text: Di Judge maintain say no be by force for Inec accept di convention of party wey no follow di Constitution, Electoral Act and di guidelines/regulations of political parties.
label: pidgin

text: For August 2025, di PDP govnors forum bin throw warning give members of di party wey no wan make di convention hold.
label: pidgin

text: On Monday, di party postpone screening if aspirants for di 2025 national convention sake of unforeseen issues. Dem no know wetin court go tok.
label: pidgin

text: Na for di convention of di party dem dey choose di National chairman and all oda national executives of di party.
label: pidgin

text: For April 2025, govnors for PDP bin rule out any option of join bodi wit oda opposition parties in oda to beat di ruling All progressives Congress (APC) by 2027.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na one of di decisions wey di govnors bin reach for dia meeting for Ibadan, Oyo State, at a time wen big members of di party, including former Vice President Atiku Abubakar, dey make moves to join body wit oda political parties.
label: pidgin

text: Defection na one of di big crisis wey don hit PDP dis year and e no be like say e dey stop any moment soon, as several govnors wey dey under di party deygo di ruling APC.
label: pidgin

text: Three out of di six South-South states wey be traditional stronghold of di PDP for more dan 20 year, don witness serious threat sake of defection.
label: pidgin

text: Sake of di latest defections wey dey rock PDP, e don weaken dia power as opposition party wey bin dey control 12 states bifor afta di 2023 general elections.
label: pidgin

text: Wit all di recent trends of defections, di APC now dey control 24 states out of di 36 states for di kontri, while PDP now dey hold eight states.
label: pidgin

text: For one exclusive interview wit BBC News Pidgin, Nyesom Wike say di party no stand any chance for 2027 if dem no put dia house in order.
label: pidgin

text: Wike wey be one of di strong hand for PDP even though e dey di side of di ruling APC as FCT MInister, tok say im no go contest for di 2027 election, sake of say im dey work wit di ruling party and e like am like dat.
label: pidgin

text: Wike howeva come insist say e no go defect from di party.
label: pidgin

text: Since di defeat of di party for di 2023 election, PDP don witness plenti crisis, defections and in-house fighting.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na part of di crisis wey don dey hit di PDP bifor now, and dem go gatz address am for di national convention if e later hold.
label: pidgin

text: Di members of di National Convention Committee na Gov Ahmadu Fintiri as Chairman, Gov. Ademola Adeleke as Vice Chairman and Gov Peter Mbah as Secretary.
label: pidgin

text: Also dem announce members of di zoning committee, according to PDP statement and dem include: Gov Douye Diri as Chairman, Gov Dauda Lawal as Vice Chairman and Gov Caleb Mutfwang as Secretary.
label: pidgin

text: Andrew lose im 'prince' title and go comot from Royal Lodge.
label: pidgin

text: Prince Andrew go loose im 'prince' title and go comot im Windsor mansion wey dem call Royal Lodge.
label: pidgin

text: But e no go dey homeless as e dey go start di royal estate for Sandringham, Norfolk.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na even though Andrew still dey deny di accusations wey dem pile for im head but di Palace say even though 'dis censures dey seen as necessary.'
label: pidgin

text: Na earlier dis month Andrew bin give up im oda royal titles wey include di Duke of York.
label: pidgin

text: Andrew dey face accuse from late Virginia Giuffre say im sleep wit her three separate times wen she be teenager.
label: pidgin

text: Di fact say Andrew dey lose im titles no go affect im pikin dem.
label: pidgin

text: Princess Eugenie and Princess Beatrice go keep dia titles.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na in line wit King George V Letters Patent of 1917.
label: pidgin

text: E tell di BBC say di Palace dey 'finally take some decisive action' but e 'no go reach to fully satisfy di public wahala'.
label: pidgin

text: E dey understood now say not only Andrew go comot di Royal Lodge but im ex-wife Sarah Ferguson go also lose access to di mansion and go need go find wia she go stay.
label: pidgin

text: Di 66 year old former Duchess of York na di mama of im two pikin and even though dem divorce for 1996, dem still be padi wey dey stay di same house.
label: pidgin

text: But she give up her Duchess title dis month wen Andrew drop im own.
label: pidgin

text: Why na now dem wan comot 'Prince' from Andrew?
label: pidgin

text: Na almost six years since Andre interview for BBC Newsnight wey make am step back for im royal duties for 2019 so why na now dem dey comot im prince title.
label: pidgin

text: Well, for dat Newsnight interview, Andrew say e cut any link e get wit paedophile Jeffrey Epstein afta dia picture for New York for December 2010.
label: pidgin

text: But for January 2025, emails comot wey show say dem bin still dey yarn afta dat time.
label: pidgin

text: For October 2025, di Mail on Sunday add say na Andrew send am true-true and even allegedly add say 'e be like we dey dis tin togeda and we go need rise above am'.
label: pidgin

text: Na still dis month, Andrew gree to give up most of im titles like Duke of York although e still stay as Prince.
label: pidgin

text: And den di book afta di death of Virginia Giuffre comot wit more details about her accuse against Prince Andrew., including di one wey she say dem nack three sperate times wen she be teenager. E deny all di accuse.
label: pidgin

text: Who be Timipre Sylva wey deny involvement for alleged Nigeria coup.
label: pidgin

text: Former Minister of State for Petroleum Timipre Sylva don deny im involvement for any alleged coup plot for Nigeria.
label: pidgin

text: Dis dey for statement wey im Special Assistant on Media and Public Affairs, Julius Bokoru sign about reports say authorities raid im house.
label: pidgin

text: During di said operation, considerable damage bin dey inflicted upon di property.
label: pidgin
